title: Daria Kasatkina's New Home in Australia
summary: Daria Kasatkina is a tennis player who used to play for Russia. She has become a citizen of Australia and is now playing in the Australian Open as a home player. This makes her feel happy and relieved because she can focus on tennis without worrying about other problems. She said she can finally breathe and live her life. Kasatkina is excited to play in front of a big home crowd in Melbourne. She will play against a young player from the Czech Republic. This is a special time for her because she has faced tough times in the past, including leaving Russia after coming out as gay and dealing with the war in Ukraine. Now, she is ready to enjoy her new chapter in Australia.

background_read: Daria Kasatkina is a professional tennis player who was born in Russia. In 2022, after Russia invaded Ukraine, she played as a neutral athlete, which means she did not represent any country. She also came out as gay that year and has not returned to Russia since. This made her life difficult, and she felt stressed. Now, she has become an Australian citizen and is excited to play in the Australian Open, a major tennis tournament, as a home player. This change allows her to focus on her sport and feel more at peace.
